name: Cube Runner (itch) (Pixelmancer)
description:
Overview:

Cube runner is a side-scrolling runner in the vein of Geometry Dash. You play as an unnamed protagonist continuously running to the right because...well...of some medical condition. Sure, let's go with that. Jump over pits, dodge the spikes, you know the deal.

The game consists of three levels (including a boss battle), a main menu and statistics page, and even a level select screen (fancy, right!). Each level is hand-crafted to make you hate the level designer...I'm not joking.

Features:

  • Three levels
  • Stats
  • Easter eggs

Controls:

[Space] - Jump

[Mouse] - Menus

[Shift] - Toggle fullscreen

A Game a Week [Week 0]:

This game is my warm-up for "a game a week" (hence the week 0) Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. Stay tuned!
